mng: Gorgon plant, fox nut (Gorgon euryale or Euryale ferox), makhana (Hindi)

exm.mng: Gorgon plant, fox nut (Gorgon euryale or Euryale ferox), makhana (Hindi)
Gorgon fruit, Semen euryales (botany), see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]
cornstarch, powder made from Gorgon fruit
cooking starch, pasty mixture of starch and water
